properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.defaults
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable default settings

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.base-packages
properties.description: Comma separaed list of base packages that are included in this application.'com.walgreens.springboot' is included by default'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.logging.profiling
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable profiler logging. Defaults to value of 'com.walgreens.springboot.defaults'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.security.url-patterns.ignored
properties.description: Comma separaed list of URL patterns that should be ignored by Spring Security

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.security.url-patterns.allowed
properties.description: Comma separaed list of URL patterns that should be allowed for all by Spring Security

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.security.logout.clear-cookies
properties.description: Comma separaed list of cookies that should be cleared on logout

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.security.logout.success-url
properties.description: URL to redirect the user to after logout. Spring default is /login?logout

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.security.session.max-count
properties.description: Maximum number of sessions to be allowed in the application. Defaults to -1 which is unlimited

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.security.session.expired-url
properties.description: URL to redirect the user if the session has expired. Defaults to /login?sessionExpired

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.security.actuator.roles
properties.description: Comma separaed list of roles that have access to actuator endpoints. Default is to allow all

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.path.home
properties.description: Path to the home page of the application. This allows to redirect user from context root / to home page

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.path.favicon
properties.description: Path to the favicon for the application which will be used on the default index and error pages. Defaults to '/com/walgreens/springboot/favicon.ico'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.default-view.index
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable default index page. Defaults to value of 'com.walgreens.springboot.defaults'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.default-view.error
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable default error page. Defaults to value of 'com.walgreens.springboot.defaults'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.api.prefix
properties.description: Path to map the utility Web APIs. Defaults to /webapi/*

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.api.auth
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable AuthController. Defaults to value of 'com.walgreens.springboot.defaults'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.api.cache
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable CacheController. Defaults to value of 'com.walgreens.springboot.defaults'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.api.debug
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable DebugController. Defaults to value of 'com.walgreens.springboot.defaults'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.api.files
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable FilesController. Defaults to value of 'com.walgreens.springboot.defaults'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.api.roles
properties.description: Comma separaed list of roles that should have access to Web APIs. Default is to allow all

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.sdf.proxy-config-path
properties.description: Classpath of the SDF proxy properties file

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.sdf.proxy-url-patterns
properties.description: Comma separaed URL patterns that need to be mapped for SDF application

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.sdf.request-handlers-package-name
properties.description: Name of the package that contains all request handlers

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.sdf.default-request-handler
properties.description: Name of the request handler that will serve the request when none is provided in the URL

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.sdf.jsp.dispatcher-prefix
properties.description: Path prefix for all JSP forwards from request handlers. Defaults to '/sdf/jsp'

properties.name: com.walgreens.springboot.web.sdf.jsp.root
properties.description: Path to root folder for the JSPs. Defaults to '/WEB-INF/jsp/'
